name: True North Payments INC.
tag_list: canada, merchant-accounts, debit, credit-card, processing, payment, merchant-services, e-commerce, visa, mastercard, american-express
overview: True North Payments INC. is a privately-held Canadian Merchant Account & Services provider headquartered in Surrey, British Columbia. With its original focus on the provision of robust, cost effective retail and e-commerce merchant account services for Canadian small business in the Metro Vancouver area, True North Payments has since expanded its service range to both Brick & Mortar Retail and Online E-Commerce credit card processing solutions across Canada. In 2010, True North Payments began to offer Visa and MasterCard merchant accounts through its acquiring banking partners. True North Payments now provides Canadian small business owners with a complete suite of credit and debit processing services, from point of sale equipment leasing, to virtual terminals and e-commerce enabled shopping cart system features.
